description.field_dense: Removes most of the metadata, allowing for more songs on screen.
description.field_slowSearch: Turn this on if you are experiencing lag when typing in the searchbar
description.field_background: Set the library background to the current album art
description.field_hardwareAcceleration: Render using GPU instead of CPU
description.field_parseStrict: Turn this on if you want to get errors when parsing invalid metadata
description.delete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete
